scripts.clean: shx rm -rf package commons-atom commons-ui commons
scripts.dev.package: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=development cross-env BABEL_KEEP_MODULES=true rollup -c -w
scripts.build.package: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=production cross-env BABEL_KEEP_MODULES=true rollup -c
scripts.build: npm run build.package && npm run build.commons-atom && npm run build.commons-ui
scripts.apm.prepublishOnly: git checkout apm.publish && git reset --hard master && shx rm -rf nuclide && git commit -m 'clean'
scripts.build.nuclide-adb: shx rm -rf nuclide/nuclide-adb/dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=development cross-env BABEL_KEEP_MODULES=false babel nuclide/nuclide-adb/lib --out-dir nuclide/nuclide-adb/dist
scripts.build.nuclide-analytics: shx rm -rf nuclide/nuclide-analytics/dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=development cross-env BABEL_KEEP_MODULES=false babel nuclide/nuclide-analytics/lib --out-dir nuclide/nuclide-analytics/dist
scripts.build.nuclide-commons: shx rm -rf nuclide/dist-nuclide-commons && shx cp -r nuclide/nuclide-commons nuclide/dist-nuclide-commons && cross-env NODE_ENV=development cross-env BABEL_KEEP_MODULES=false babel nuclide/dist-nuclide-commons --out-dir nuclide/dist-nuclide-commons
scripts.build.nuclide-commons-atom: shx rm -rf nuclide/dist-nuclide-commons-atom && shx cp -r nuclide/nuclide-commons-atom nuclide/dist-nuclide-commons-atom && cross-env NODE_ENV=development cross-env BABEL_KEEP_MODULES=false babel nuclide/dist-nuclide-commons-atom --out-dir nuclide/dist-nuclide-commons-atom
scripts.build.nuclide-commons-ui: shx rm -rf nuclide/dist-nuclide-commons-ui && shx cp -r nuclide/nuclide-commons-ui nuclide/dist-nuclide-commons-ui && cross-env NODE_ENV=development cross-env BABEL_KEEP_MODULES=false babel nuclide/dist-nuclide-commons-ui --out-dir nuclide/dist-nuclide-commons-ui
scripts.build.nuclide-debugger-cli: shx rm -rf nuclide/nuclide-debugger-cli/dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=development cross-env BABEL_KEEP_MODULES=false babel nuclide/nuclide-debugger-cli/lib --out-dir nuclide/nuclide-debugger-cli/dist
scripts.build.nuclide-debugger-common: shx rm -rf nuclide/dist-nuclide-debugger-common && shx cp -r nuclide/nuclide-debugger-common nuclide/dist-nuclide-debugger-common && cross-env NODE_ENV=development cross-env BABEL_KEEP_MODULES=false babel nuclide/dist-nuclide-debugger-common --out-dir nuclide/dist-nuclide-debugger-common
scripts.build.nuclide-fuzzy-native: shx rm -rf nuclide/nuclide-fuzzy-native/dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=development cross-env BABEL_KEEP_MODULES=false babel nuclide/nuclide-fuzzy-native/lib --out-dir nuclide/nuclide-fuzzy-native/dist
scripts.build.nuclide-watchman-helpers: shx rm -rf nuclide/nuclide-watchman-helpers/dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=development cross-env BABEL_KEEP_MODULES=false babel nuclide/nuclide-watchman-helpers/lib --out-dir nuclide/nuclide-watchman-helpers/dist
scripts.build.nuclide-node-transpiler: shx rm -rf nuclide/dist-nuclide-node-transpiler && shx cp -r nuclide/nuclide-node-transpiler nuclide/dist-nuclide-node-transpiler && cross-env NODE_ENV=development cross-env BABEL_KEEP_MODULES=false babel nuclide/dist-nuclide-node-transpiler --out-dir nuclide/dist-nuclide-node-transpiler
scripts.build.jest-atom-runner: shx rm -rf nuclide/atom-test-runners/jest-atom-runner/dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=development cross-env BABEL_KEEP_MODULES=false babel nuclide/atom-test-runners/jest-atom-runner/src --out-dir nuclide/atom-test-runners/jest-atom-runner/dist
scripts.clean.nuclide: shx rm -rf nuclide/nuclide-adb/dist nuclide/nuclide-analytics/dist nuclide/dist-nuclide-commons nuclide/dist-nuclide-commons-atom nuclide/dist-nuclide-commons-ui nuclide/nuclide-debugger-cli/dist nuclide/dist-nuclide-debugger-common nuclide/nuclide-fuzzy-native/dist nuclide/nuclide-watchman-helpers/dist nuclide/dist-nuclide-node-transpiler nuclide/**/node_modules
scripts.build.nuclide: npm run build.nuclide-adb && npm run build.nuclide-analytics && npm run build.nuclide-commons && npm run build.nuclide-commons-atom && npm run build.nuclide-commons-ui && npm run build.nuclide-debugger-cli && npm run build.nuclide-debugger-common && npm run build.nuclide-fuzzy-native && npm run build.nuclide-watchman-helpers && npm run build.nuclide-node-transpiler && npm run build.jest-atom-runner
